product_name: Bell Tater Bike Helmet - Toddler Girls'
long_description: The girls' Bell Tater bike helmet not only offers a fun design, but plenty of protection, built-in flashing lights and an easy-to-use strap system to simplify getting the helmet on and off. One Step(TM) fit system allows fast and intuitive fitting; simply put the helmet on, snap the pinch-free buckle and off they go. One Step ensures the helmet is both properly fitted and properly worn; it self adjusts to the correct size without yanking, adjusting and fussing after the initial fitting. In-mold helmet construction bonds a flyweight shell to high-performance expanded polystyrene foam liner for an excellent strength-to-weight ratio and protection. 7 vents allow cool, fresh air to circulate over and around child's head; front vents feature a net liner to keep big bugs out. Built-in rear flashing LED lights on the girls' Bell Tater bike helmet enhance visibility; the lights run on replaceable coin-cell batteries (included).
